# wy-preview-text

## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Type      | Default |
|---------------------|-----------|-----------|---------|
| `code`              | `code`    | `boolean` | false   |
| `html`              | `html`    | `boolean` | false   |
| `loading`           |           | `boolean` | true    |
| `src`               | `src`     | `string`  |         |
| `textOrHtmlContent` |           | `string`  | ""      |
